Instruction: Heat a grill outdoors to medium heat and lightly grease the grates.
Mix together the ground pork, ground beef, ground lamb, and egg white in a large bowl.
Mix in the minced garlic, black pepper, salt, baking soda, cayenne pepper, and paprika. Blend thoroughly by hand and shape the mixture into sausages that are about 3/4-inch thick and finger-length.

Grill the sausages on medium heat, turning them occasionally, until they are cooked through and no longer pink in the center, which takes about 30 minutes. Use an instant-read thermometer to check that the internal temperature reaches 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
